title: Pairing with "Poster Sans"
content:
Hello,

This is my first time posting but I've been browsing for a long time and I just wanted to say you guys are amazing! I'm a design student working on a film festival poster right now for Jean-Luc Godard. My logo type uses [Poster Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043821/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/k-type/poster-sans/) and I was trying to find a supporting typeface or family that pairs well with it, preferably sans serif (which I understand is hard to do successfully). I really appreciate it!

-Nick
author: nnavarro

comments.content: For a contrasting, wide sans there's [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043821/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/) or for a nice geometric sans, that's especially good for text, there's [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043821/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html).
